# Linear Regression
Based on artificial Ecommerce dataset, this notebook consists of Linear Regression Analysis 
with steps below;  
            -Data Input    
            -Exploratory Data Analysis    
            -Data Visualization    
            -Splitting Test and Train Data  
            -Training Model  
            -Predicting Test Data  
            -Evaluating the Model  
            -Residuals  
            -Conclusion
